00034   typedef struct {
00035     String     log_dir;
00036     uint32_t   num;
00037     uint64_t   size;
00038     int64_t    revision;
00039     bool       purge_log_dir;
00040     CommitLogBlockStream *block_stream;
00041   } CommitLogFileInfo;
00042 
00046   inline bool
00047   operator<(const CommitLogFileInfo &x, const CommitLogFileInfo &y) {
00048     return x.revision < y.revision;
00049   }
00050 
00051   typedef std::deque<CommitLogFileInfo> LogFragmentQueue;
00052 
00055   class CommitLogBase : public ReferenceCount {
00056   public:
00057     CommitLogBase(const String &log_dir)
00058       : m_log_dir(log_dir), m_latest_revision(TIMESTAMP_MIN) {
00059       size_t lastslash = log_dir.find_last_of('/');
00060 
00061       if (lastslash == log_dir.length()-1)
00062         lastslash = log_dir.find_last_of('/', log_dir.length()-2);
00063 
00064       m_log_name = (lastslash == String::npos) ? log_dir
00065                                                : log_dir.substr(lastslash+1);
00066     }
00067 
00068     void stitch_in(CommitLogBase *other) {
00069       for (LogFragmentQueue::iterator iter = other->m_fragment_queue.begin();
00070            iter != other->m_fragment_queue.end(); iter++)
00071         m_fragment_queue.push_back(*iter);
00072     }
00073 
00074     String &get_log_dir() { return m_log_dir; }
00075 
00076     int64_t get_latest_revision() { return m_latest_revision; }
00077 
00078     bool empty() { return m_fragment_queue.empty(); }
00079 
00080   protected:
00081     String           m_log_dir;
00082     String           m_log_name;
00083     LogFragmentQueue m_fragment_queue;
00084     int64_t          m_latest_revision;
00085   };
00086 
00087   typedef intrusive_ptr<CommitLogBase> CommitLogBasePtr;

00089 } // namespace Hypertable
